articles.description: Members of the public have continued to gather at the gates of royal residences of the United Kingdom this morning with hundreds of bouquets, personal notes and candles left in her honour.
articles.content: Great Britain is united in grief following the death of Her Majesty The Queen, with tens of thousands of people seen flocking to Buckingham Palace to pay their respects ahead of King Charles III bein… [+16060 chars]

articles.author: John Dingwall
articles.title: Royal beekeeper has informed the Queen's bees that HM has died and King Charles is their new boss - Daily Mail
articles.description: Royal beekeeper, John Chapple, has informed the hives kept in the grounds of Buckingham Palace and Clarence House of the Queen's death. The bees were also told King Charles is now their boss.
articles.content:
The royal beekeeper - in an arcane tradition thought to date back centuries - has informed the hives kept in the grounds of Buckingham Palace and Clarence House of the Queens death.
